page.title: 18THE RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: At the end of Feverills Road in Little Clacton,there is a little riding school.Every Saturday and sometimes on a week day I go down there for lessons.Its really good fun because we don't just ride but we help out there too.We do things like grooming,tacking up,sweeping the yard and in the summer I do mucking out.In the yard where we ride,they have laid a new surface made out of ash. We use four ponies whose names are Crystal,Snowy,Twilight and Peanuts. Twilight is our favourite because she is easy to ride and has got a comfy saddle.At the moment we are praticing at cantering and jumping in a large field,and the owner puts them up 2 or 3 holes from the ground. Crystal can jump the highest. One day I hope to work in, or own a stable of my own.
